entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
